statements: SELECT * FROM VolunteerAttendance;
SELECT volunteer_id, attendance_date, hours_spent FROM VolunteerAttendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT event_id, volunteer_id FROM VolunteerAttendance WHERE hours_spent > 5;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, SUM(hours_spent) AS total_hours FROM VolunteerAttendance GROUP BY volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerAttendance WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT volunteer_id, attendance_date FROM VolunteerAttendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM VolunteerAttendance GROUP BY volunteer_id;
SELECT volunteer_id, SUM(hours_spent) AS total_hours FROM VolunteerAttendance GROUP BY volunteer_id HAVING total_hours > 10;
SELECT event_id, volunteer_id, attendance_date FROM VolunteerAttendance WHERE hours_spent >= 5 ORDER BY event_id ASC, attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Events
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE event_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM Events LEFT JOIN Attendees ON Events.event_id = Attendees.event_id GROUP BY event_name
SELECT event_name, attendee_name, attendance_status FROM Events INNER JOIN Attendees ON Events.event_id = Attendees.event_id WHERE event_name LIKE 'Annual%'
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS num_attendees FROM Events e JOIN Attendees a ON e.event_id = a.event_id GROUP BY e.event_name;
SELECT attendee_name, event_name, attendance_status FROM Attendees a JOIN Events e ON a.event_id = e.event_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events WHERE location <> 'Online' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, volunteer_name, attendance_date, status FROM Events INNER JOIN Attendance ON Events.event_id = Attendance.event_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_phone LIKE '%555%';

SELECT event_name, event_date, volunteer_name, status FROM Events JOIN Attendance ON Events.event_id = Attendance.event_id JOIN Volunteers ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = Attendance.volunteer_id WHERE Events.event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND Attendance.status = 'Attended';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT event_name, event_location, attendance_date FROM Events JOIN Attendance ON Events.event_id = Attendance.event_id WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM volunteer_events WHERE attendance_count > 10;
SELECT event_name, attendance_count FROM volunteer_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, contact_number FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id < 5;
SELECT event_id, volunteer_id, attendance_status FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM volunteer_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM volunteer_events WHERE attendance_count > 10;
SELECT volunteer_name, contact_number FROM volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT e.event_name, v.volunteer_name, ea.attendance_status FROM volunteer_events e JOIN event_attendance ea ON e.event_id = ea.event_id JOIN volunteers v ON ea.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id;

SELECT e.event_name, v.volunteer_name, ef.feedback_text FROM volunteer_events e JOIN event_feedback ef ON e.event_id = ef.event_id JOIN volunteers v ON ef.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id WHERE e.event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT volunteer_name, activity_name FROM Volunteers INNER JOIN VolunteerActivities ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = VolunteerActivities.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Activities ON VolunteerActivities.activity_id = Activities.activity_id;

SELECT volunteer_name, event_name, attendance_date FROM Volunteers INNER JOIN Attendance ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = Attendance.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Events ON Attendance.event_id = Events.event_id ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM Volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_name, activity_name FROM Volunteers INNER JOIN VolunteerActivities ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = VolunteerActivities.volunteer_id WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendance_id) AS total_attendance FROM Events INNER JOIN Attendance ON Events.event_id = Attendance.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendance > 10;
